reviews.review: I have played this game for 2 years and I have to say the amount I liked the game has only gone up. This is a necesity if you are on Steam. This, TF2, and Garry's Mod are necesities.
Hate it. Used to be fun but hackers and smurfs have ruined the fun. If valve fixes it someday I'll edit my review. -2017 Sill or pay to win cheats are what you buy gamez are what you win....
Muito bom, Trabalho do anti-cheat é realmente melhor q muitos ai
